00025 // Basic TNT  numerical vector (0-based [i] AND 1-based (i) indexing )
00026 //
00027 
00028 #ifndef VEC_H
00029 #define VEC_H
00030 
00031 #include "tnt/subscript.h"
00032 #include <cstdlib>
00033 #include <cassert>
00034 #include <iostream>
00035 #include <strstream>
00036 
00037 namespace TNT
00038 {
00039 
00040 template <class T>
00041 class Vector 
00042 {
00043 
00044 
00045   public:
00046 
00047     typedef Subscript   size_type;
00048     typedef         T   value_type;
00049     typedef         T   element_type;
00050     typedef         T*  pointer;
00051     typedef         T*  iterator;
00052     typedef         T&  reference;
00053     typedef const   T*  const_iterator;
00054     typedef const   T&  const_reference;
00055 
00056     Subscript lbound() const { return 1;}
00057  
00058   protected:
00059     T* v_;                  
00060     T* vm1_;        // pointer adjustment for optimzied 1-offset indexing
00061     Subscript n_;
00062 
00063     // internal helper function to create the array
00064     // of row pointers
00065 
00066     void initialize(Subscript N)
00067     {
00068         // adjust pointers so that they are 1-offset:
00069         // v_[] is the internal contiguous array, it is still 0-offset
00070         //
00071         assert(v_ == NULL);
00072         v_ = new T[N];
00073         assert(v_  != NULL);
00074         vm1_ = v_-1;
00075         n_ = N;
00076     }
00077    
00078     void copy(const T*  v)
00079     {
00080         Subscript N = n_;
00081         Subscript i;
00082 
00083 #ifdef TNT_UNROLL_LOOPS
00084         Subscript Nmod4 = N & 3;
00085         Subscript N4 = N - Nmod4;
00086 
00087         for (i=0; i<N4; i+=4)
00088         {
00089             v_[i] = v[i];
00090             v_[i+1] = v[i+1];
00091             v_[i+2] = v[i+2];
00092             v_[i+3] = v[i+3];
00093         }
00094 
00095         for (i=N4; i< N; i++)
00096             v_[i] = v[i];
00097 #else
00098 
00099         for (i=0; i< N; i++)
00100             v_[i] = v[i];
00101 #endif      
00102     }
00103 
00104     void set(const T& val)
00105     {
00106         Subscript N = n_;
00107         Subscript i;
00108 
00109 #ifdef TNT_UNROLL_LOOPS
00110         Subscript Nmod4 = N & 3;
00111         Subscript N4 = N - Nmod4;
00112 
00113         for (i=0; i<N4; i+=4)
00114         {
00115             v_[i] = val;
00116             v_[i+1] = val;
00117             v_[i+2] = val;
00118             v_[i+3] = val; 
00119         }
00120 
00121         for (i=N4; i< N; i++)
00122             v_[i] = val;
00123 #else
00124 
00125         for (i=0; i< N; i++)
00126             v_[i] = val;
00127         
00128 #endif      
00129     }
00130     
00131 
00132 
00133     void destroy()
00134     {     
00135         /* do nothing, if no memory has been previously allocated */
00136         if (v_ == NULL) return ;
00137 
00138         /* if we are here, then matrix was previously allocated */
00139         delete [] (v_);     
00140 
00141         v_ = NULL;
00142         vm1_ = NULL;
00143     }
00144 
00145 
00146   public:
00147 
00148     // access
00149 
00150     iterator begin() { return v_;}
00151     iterator end()   { return v_ + n_; }
00152     const iterator begin() const { return v_;}
00153     const iterator end() const  { return v_ + n_; }
00154 
00155     // destructor
00156 
00157     ~Vector() 
00158     {
00159         destroy();
00160     }
00161 
00162     // constructors
00163 
00164     Vector() : v_(0), vm1_(0), n_(0)  {};
00165 
00166     Vector(const Vector<T> &A) : v_(0), vm1_(0), n_(0)
00167     {
00168         initialize(A.n_);
00169         copy(A.v_);
00170     }
00171 
00172     Vector(Subscript N, const T& value = T()) :  v_(0), vm1_(0), n_(0)
00173     {
00174         initialize(N);
00175         set(value);
00176     }
00177 
00178     Vector(Subscript N, const T* v) :  v_(0), vm1_(0), n_(0)
00179     {
00180         initialize(N);
00181         copy(v);
00182     }
00183 
00184     Vector(Subscript N, char *s) :  v_(0), vm1_(0), n_(0)
00185     {
00186         initialize(N);
00187         std::istrstream ins(s);
00188 
00189         Subscript i;
00190 
00191         for (i=0; i<N; i++)
00192                 ins >> v_[i];
00193     }
00194 
00195 
00196     // methods
00197     // 
00198     Vector<T>& newsize(Subscript N)
00199     {
00200         if (n_ == N) return *this;
00201 
00202         destroy();
00203         initialize(N);
00204 
00205         return *this;
00206     }
00207 
00208 
00209     // assignments
00210     //
00211     Vector<T>& operator=(const Vector<T> &A)
00212     {
00213         if (v_ == A.v_)
00214             return *this;
00215 
00216         if (n_ == A.n_)         // no need to re-alloc
00217             copy(A.v_);
00218 
00219         else
00220         {
00221             destroy();
00222             initialize(A.n_);
00223             copy(A.v_);
00224         }
00225 
00226         return *this;
00227     }
00228         
00229     Vector<T>& operator=(const T& scalar)
00230     { 
00231         set(scalar);  
00232         return *this;
00233     }
00234 
00235     inline Subscript dim() const 
00236     {
00237         return  n_; 
00238     }
00239 
00240     inline Subscript size() const 
00241     {
00242         return  n_; 
00243     }
00244 
00245 
00246     inline reference operator()(Subscript i)
00247     { 
00248 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00249         assert(1<=i);
00250         assert(i <= n_) ;
00251 #endif
00252         return vm1_[i]; 
00253     }
00254 
00255     inline const_reference operator() (Subscript i) const
00256     {
00257 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00258         assert(1<=i);
00259         assert(i <= n_) ;
00260 #endif
00261         return vm1_[i]; 
00262     }
00263 
00264     inline reference operator[](Subscript i)
00265     { 
00266 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00267         assert(0<=i);
00268         assert(i < n_) ;
00269 #endif
00270         return v_[i]; 
00271     }
00272 
00273     inline const_reference operator[](Subscript i) const
00274     {
00275 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00276         assert(0<=i);
00277 
00278 
00279 
00280 
00281 
00282 
00283         assert(i < n_) ;
00284 #endif
00285         return v_[i]; 
00286     }
00287 
00288 
00289 
00290 };

00293 /* ***************************  I/O  ********************************/
00294 
00295 template <class T>
00296 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &s, const Vector<T> &A)
00297 {
00298     Subscript N=A.dim();
00299 
00300     s <<  N << endl;
00301 
00302     for (Subscript i=0; i<N; i++)
00303         s   << A[i] << " " << endl;
00304     s << endl;
00305 
00306     return s;
00307 }
00308 
00309 template <class T>
00310 std::istream & operator>>(std::istream &s, Vector<T> &A)
00311 {
00312 
00313     Subscript N;
00314 
00315     s >> N;
00316 
00317     if ( !(N == A.size() ))
00318     {
00319         A.newsize(N);
00320     }
00321 
00322 
00323     for (Subscript i=0; i<N; i++)
00324             s >>  A[i];
00325 
00326 
00327     return s;
00328 }
00329 
00330 // *******************[ basic matrix algorithms ]***************************
00331 
00332 
00333 template <class T>
00334 Vector<T> operator+(const Vector<T> &A, 
00335     const Vector<T> &B)
00336 {
00337     Subscript N = A.dim();
00338 
00339     assert(N==B.dim());
00340 
00341     Vector<T> tmp(N);
00342     Subscript i;
00343 
00344     for (i=0; i<N; i++)
00345             tmp[i] = A[i] + B[i];
00346 
00347     return tmp;
00348 }
00349 
00350 template <class T>
00351 Vector<T> operator-(const Vector<T> &A, 
00352     const Vector<T> &B)
00353 {
00354     Subscript N = A.dim();
00355 
00356     assert(N==B.dim());
00357 
00358     Vector<T> tmp(N);
00359     Subscript i;
00360 
00361     for (i=0; i<N; i++)
00362             tmp[i] = A[i] - B[i];
00363 
00364     return tmp;
00365 }
00366 
00367 template <class T>
00368 Vector<T> operator*(const Vector<T> &A, 
00369     const Vector<T> &B)
00370 {
00371     Subscript N = A.dim();
00372 
00373     assert(N==B.dim());
00374 
00375     Vector<T> tmp(N);
00376     Subscript i;
00377 
00378     for (i=0; i<N; i++)
00379             tmp[i] = A[i] * B[i];
00380 
00381     return tmp;
00382 }
00383 
00384 
00385 template <class T>
00386 T dot_prod(const Vector<T> &A, const Vector<T> &B)
00387 {
00388     Subscript N = A.dim();
00389     assert(N == B.dim());
00390 
00391     Subscript i;
00392     T sum = 0;
00393 
00394     for (i=0; i<N; i++)
00395         sum += A[i] * B[i];
00396 
00397     return sum;
00398 }

00400 }   /* namespace TNT */
